    • Graph

      public Graph​(int[][] matrix)
      This constructor creates an array of Vertex containing the graph given as adjacency matrix
      Parameters:
      matrix - the adjacency matrix containing the graph

    • Graph

      public Graph​(java.lang.String inputfile)
      This constructor creates an array of Vertex containing the graph given as file
      Parameters:
      inputfile - path to the file containing the graph

    • Graph

      public Graph​(int vertices, int edges)
      This constructor creates an array of Vertex containing a graph randomly created
      Parameters:
      vertices - number of vertices contained in the graph
      edges - number of edges contained in the graph

    • isColValid

      public boolean isColValid​(int col, int id)
      checker of the validity of a color
      Parameters:
      col - value of the colour
      id - number of the vertex-1
      Returns:
      true if color is valid, false otherwise

    • setColor

      public boolean setColor​(int col, int id, boolean legal)
      setter of the color of a vertex
      Parameters:
      col - value of the colour
      id - number of the vertex-1
      legal - boolean asking for the colourizing to be authorized or not (illegal colouring is used for example in the tabu search)
      Returns:
      true if the color was changed

    • getColor

      public int getColor​(int id)
      getter of the color of a vertex
      Parameters:
      id - number of the vertex-1
      Returns:
      the color of the vertex id

    • setColorArray

      public void setColorArray​(int[] col)

      Parameters:

    • checkColoring

      public void checkColoring​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> vertices, java.util.ArrayList<Edge> edges)
      checker of the validity of a graph coloring (used for example in tabu search)
      Parameters:
      vertices - an ArrayList that will contain all conflicting vertices
      edges - an ArrayList that will contain all conflicting edges

    • getNumberAdjVertCol

      public int getNumberAdjVertCol​(int id, int col)
      checker of the gamma factor of a vertex (cf Tabucol)
      Parameters:
      id - value of the vertex
      col - number of the color
      Returns:
      the number of adjacent vertices of color col
